content.rendered:
[mk_page_section layout_structure=”half_left” bg_image=”https://jdstrata.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/website-052.jpg” video_color_mask=”#ffffff” video_opacity=”0.8″ top_shadow=”true”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”20″][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner][mk_fancy_title color=”#cfd628″ size=”24″ font_weight=”400″ txt_transform=”uppercase” margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”line-green”]Contractors[/mk_fancy_title][mk_fancy_title color=”#524a48″ size=”18″ line_height=”150″ font_weight=”400″ margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left”]We engage several hundred contractors and tradespeople across Western Australia to service the Strata Companies we manage.

If you would like to be included in our pool of tradespeople, please contact our office using the ‘Contact Us’ form, or by phone on 08 9335 5877 to advise us of your services, availability and contact details.[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1589584913707{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Please also make sure to include any relevant licences, insurance details or other qualifications; along with your ABN (Australian Business Number).

Note that you may be contacted from time to time to ensure we have up to date information in regard to your licences, qualifications and insurance details.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/mk_page_section]
